Html:
Hi,

I started Writing Cases(Test code in C#)  for MVVM Model using White, but am facing many issue.

(am able to run Simple WPF aplication using White,but when i use MVVM model am facing issue).

Can someone please provide standard example for MVVM(Composite WPF) using White.

Thanks in Advance.

Naveen

Hi Naveen,

The Stock Trader Reference Implementation (which uses MVVM) for the latest Prism release comes with Automation Tests created with White, so they might be useful for you. You can find them in the solution located at ~DecompressionFolder\RI\StockTraderRI.Tests.AcceptanceTest\StockTraderRI.Tests.AcceptanceTest.sln.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
